sentences: tal on ju see krõnks siit alt justkui ära kulunud, ta võib ka 2 olla.
Kes seda vana krõnksu enam kosib!
On üks igavene kuri krõnks ministeeriumis.
context: The Estonian word 'viid' appears to be a typographical error or variant of the word 'krõnks' based on the dictionary definitions provided. 'Krõnks' can refer to 1) a bend, curve, or hook (a kõnek/kõverus), or 2) an old, often crooked person who has shrunk and become hunched over. The word is used in colloquial speech with both physical and metaphorical meanings.
